page.title: 16SENIOR CITIZENS IN THORNBURY
page.content:
At present retirement age for men is 65 and 60 for women. With unemployment running at 3,500,000 many people are encouraged to take early retirement. Many senior citizens join together to organize outings, guest speakers, and activity sessions for themselves.
{The Thornbury Branch of the National {Federation of Retirement Pensions Ass. was founded in 1947. They meet on the first Tuesday in the month at the Cossham Hall. They have 168 members. { Avon Health Authority provide residential care for elderly and handicapped people. One centre is at {Alexandra Way}where there are 45 rooms catering for the present 42 in-mates. Minimum age for entry for non handicpped people is 52 years.
